thread.title: 'The Flash' 2.04 Preview Introduces the New Half of Firestorm
thread.title_full: 'The Flash' 2.04 Preview Introduces the New Half of Firestorm

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'The Flash' 2.04 Preview Introduces the New Half of Firestorm
text:
Comments Barry and the team find the perfect match for Dr. Stein in Jefferson 'Jax' Jackson (Franz Drameh). 
Dr. Stein ( Victor Garber ) isn't going to be alone in his actions after losing the other half of Firestorm, Ronnie Raymond ( Robbie Amell ). As seen in a preview for the next episode of " The Flash ", in an attempt to save Dr. Stein's life, the S.T.A.R. Labs team finds his perfect match in Jefferson "Jax" Jackson. Jax, played by Franz Drameh, will be introduced in the upcoming episode. He appears to be working in a workshop, before Barry ( Grant Gustin ) and his team recruit him. Jax is also seen showing off his abilities in the video. "The Fury of Firestorm" airs Tuesday, October 27 at 8/7c on The CW. According to the official synopsis, when the team meets Jefferson "Jax" Jackson, Caitlin has her reservations about whether Jax is the right match for Dr. Stein. Iris surprises Joe while Barry and Patty grow closer.
